insert into t_dx_vehicle_sale_invoice ( uuid, buyer_id_num, vehicle_type, factory_model, product_place, certificate, certificate_import, inspection_num, engine_no, vehicle_no, phone, buyer_bank, tax_rate, tax_bureau_name, tax_bureau_code, tax_records, limit_people, tonnage, create_date
) values ( #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.uuid}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.buyerIdNum}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.vehicleType}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.factoryModel}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.productPlace}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.certificate}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.certificateImport}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.inspectionNum}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.engineNo}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.vehicleNo}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.phone}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.buyerBank}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.taxRate}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.taxBureauName}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.taxBureauCode}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.taxRecords}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.limitPeople}, #{tDxVehicleSaleInvoice.tonnage}, getdate() )
